title: Design for Printed Textile-Shower, Series #500-505
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Colored tissue and wove paper, graphite on white bond paper
description: Multicolored papers cut into tapered triangles glued to white paper in random pattern, vertically descending to sugest rain.
name: Collage
